widgets.title: Current status
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT latest(k8s.status) as 'status' WHERE metricName = 'k8s.pod.startTime'

widgets.title: Status over time
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT 1 WHERE metricName = 'k8s.pod.startTime' facet k8s.status TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Pod readiness & status
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT min(k8s.pod.isReady) as 'Ready', min(k8s.pod.isScheduled) as 'Scheduled' TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Network
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT max(k8s.pod.netRxBytesPerSecond) / 1000 AS 'Received KBps', max(k8s.pod.netTxBytesPerSecond) / 1000 AS 'Transmitted KBps', max(k8s.pod.netErrorsPerSecond) AS 'Errors / sec' TIMESERIES
